ygData.subject: Re: RE: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Me. I have roughly 2-3 hours a night to play (on good days) and I am not willing to waste a weekend camping in a computer game. I am sure many feel the
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:
>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Yes, I totally agree with you. Who's NOT going to camp for things like
> JBoots? :)

Me. I have roughly 2-3 hours a night to play (on good days) and I am not
willing to waste a weekend camping in a computer game. I am sure many
feel the same way.

I don't really need them as well. I'm a wizard, I have teleports to most
places. When I am in a group I get SOW or if there is no shaman or druid
I can always gate out in a bad situation. When I solo I ask someone to
give me SOw. That simple. JBoots are highly overrated, IMO. At least for
wizards.

--
Sergey
--

KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
